stages.name: Beggar
stages.intro: You wake on a cobbled side street, dazed in old clothes and no possessions

stages.name: Lumberjack
stages.intro: A local craftsman is paying well for wood, this is an oppertunity to make some money

stages.name: Miner
stages.intro: Miners always seem to have more money, lets give that a go.

stages.name: Blacksmith
stages.intro: The local blacksmith is awful, i could do much better

stages.name: Salesperson
stages.intro: This is tiring work, i need something less physical

stages.name: Business owner
stages.intro: The golf game wont work on it self, i need to get some employees to do the work for me

stages.name: Local political candidate
stages.intro: Business it about following the right trends, and the current trend is business owners becoming politicians

stages.name: Politician
stages.intro: I won the election, im not suppose to use this to get rich am I?
